answers.author: Brenda Fischer
answers.text:
Clark County, NV has several positions and post their job descriptions on their website, www.accessclarkcounty.com.  Go to the HR department, then click on the "Job Description" link on the left side menu.  It's alphabetical so you can look under Public Affairs and Public Information.  It also includes the position salary.  
The City of Henderson, NV, also posts their public information jobs online, with salary.  Go to www.cityofhenderson.com.  Go to Government, then departments, then Human Resources, then Job Descriptions on the left side menu.
I hope this helps!

author: Cameron Clapper
text:
We are looking at creating a public communications position that would be responsible for all public communications for the city, including during emergencies. This position would also take responsibility for our public access channel. Does anyone have a good Public Information Officer or Public Communications position description they would be willing to share?
Thank you.
